Event-Driven Cursor Watcher Implementation Complete

Created reusable cursor watcher system for host editor streaming with event-driven architecture:

Components Created:
1. ViewportCalculator (viewport/ViewportCalculator.ts) - Analyzes viewport geometry and calculates optimal reveal strategy
2. CursorWatcher (viewport/CursorWatcher.ts) - Event-driven cursor positioning that listens to textInserted events
3. Updated TextAppender - Now extends EventEmitter, emits 'textInserted' events after successful insertions

Integration:
- CursorWatcher auto-attaches to TextAppender in EditorStreamingService initialization
- Smart centering: Centers cursor if enough room top/bottom, otherwise minimal scrolling
- Auto-disabled during finalization to prevent unwanted scrolling
- Public API: enableCursorWatching() / disableCursorWatching() methods

Architecture Benefits:
- Fully event-driven and decoupled
- Reusable across any streaming operation
- Follows ultra-modular pattern (single responsibility)
- Zero breaking changes to existing code
